name: translit
title: Translit
description: Convert Latin characters to Cyrillic using phonetic transliteration
author: daniel_andersson

commands.name: index
commands.title: Latin to Cyrillic
commands.subtitle: Phonetic Transliteration
commands.description: Convert Latin characters to Cyrillic using phonetic transliteration rules

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
